about_the_game:
VARK SHORTS Premium is software that allows you to easily create videos by simply selecting a template and loading a VRM avatar.


Creating videos using avatars is a very time-consuming process, but with VARK SHORTS Premium, you can create professional-quality videos in a short time by arranging them based on templates. Bring your avatar or your company's characters to life and expand the possibilities for self-promotion, introduction videos, creative activities, and more!

　

[Features of VARK SHORTS Premium]

1. Anyone can quickly and easily create videos

Anyone can create a video right away by simply selecting a template and loading your avatar.

2. Rich templates

With over 150 types of short video templates and over 100 types of regular video templates, you can easily create a wide variety of videos.

3. Various arrangements possible

You can change each item, including avatars, facial expressions, lip sync, text, images, BGM, and text to speech. Furthermore, it is possible to arrange using more than 150 types of preset avatars and more than 200 types of preset animations.

4. Share the video you created on SNS! Commercial use is also possible

Once you create a video, share it with everyone on SNS! Data created with VARK SHORTS Premium can be used for commercial and non-commercial use by individuals and corporations alike.

　
　

[Please try the demo version!]

Please try the free demo version "VARK SHORTS Premium Demo".
*The demo version will include a "SAMPLE" watermark on the video. Other functions are the same as "VARK SHORTS Premium".
